A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The peculiarity starts when the sky turns red during the full moon. The family just wants to fit in, and Alice (beginning to develop an appreciation of cats) tries to make friends at the hospital where she's worked for a year.
